name: HuggingFaceFW/fineweb-edu
description: The FineWeb-Edu dataset, a 1.3 trillion token collection, represents a significant step forward in the realm of educational data. Developed by HuggingFaceFW, this dataset is a filtered version of the FineWeb dataset, offering a high-quality resource for researchers and developers. The dataset's quality is enhanced through the use of an educational quality classifier, trained with annotations from LLama3-70B-Instruct. This dataset is a valuable asset for those working in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP), particularly those interested in educational data and web scraping. With its vast size and high quality, the FineWeb-Edu dataset offers a unique opportunity to explore and analyze educational content from the web.

creator: HuggingFaceFW
